meanings.sent1: Some people think that only idiots can't solve simple puzzles.
meanings.sent2: The teacher helped the students, but the idiots still couldn't understand.
meanings.sent3: The group project was a disaster because the idiots kept forgetting their parts.
meanings.sent4: In the land of the blind, the one-eyed man is king - a saying that highlights the struggle of idiots in a world of geniuses.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the villains as power-hungry idiots who couldn't see the error of their ways.

meanings.sent1: Don't be an idiot and touch the hot stove!
meanings.sent2: The prank backfired, making the joker look like an idiot.
meanings.sent3: The idiotic decision to jump off the roof ended in a broken leg.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness made him an island of idiocy in a sea of reason.
meanings.sent5: The idiotic driver ignored the red light, causing chaos at the intersection.
